channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As Trump pushes Supreme Court to uphold his tariffs, he signals trade deals will be defunct if he loses the case: ‘I guess we’d have to unwind them’
item.description: “If we don't win that case, our country is going to suffer so greatly, so greatly,” the president said on Wednesday.

item.title: Trump Tests the Limits of His Power With a New Airstrike
item.description: The Trump administration seems to be betting that Americans are so inured to the war on terrorism that they’ll be indifferent to extrajudicial executi...

item.title: Tariff instability and a break with China is hitting American companies hard, and homegrown manufacturer John Deere is no exception
item.description: Trump’s tariff policies are hitting John Deere’s customers hard.

item.title: Appeals Court Says ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ Detention Center Can Stay Open
item.description: An appeals panel paused a federal judge’s ruling that no additional detainees could be sent to the center, and that much of it had to be dismantled wi...

item.title: After Boat Strike, Rubio Says U.S. Will Help Other Nations ‘Blow Up’ Crime Groups
item.description: The Trump administration aims to carry out more violent strikes against drug cartels, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said as he met with Ecuador’s pre...

item.title: Quakes on Mars Reveal New Features of the Planet’s Interior
item.description: Using data from NASA’s retired InSight lander, two separate teams of researchers found evidence of a sluggish Martian mantle and a solid inner core.

item.title: America’s billionaires are older than ever, with one in five already in their 80s or 90s—as millennials await the Great Wealth Transfer
item.description: There’s a record 36 billionaires over 90. Some are still showing up at the office. Meanwhile, “young” billionaires (under 50) make up just 10% of the ...

item.title: Authorities raided Streameast’s offices and shut down the largest illegal sports streaming platform that had over 1.6 billion visits in the last year
item.description: The network illegally streamed matches and games from Europe’s Premier League and Champions League, as well as those from the NFL, NBA, and MLB.

item.title: Time Is Running Out for Lebanon to Disarm Hezbollah, U.S. Officials Warn
item.description: The United States, Israel and the Gulf Arab states are pressuring Lebanon’s government to act decisively against the group.

item.title: Trump demands immediate Supreme Court showdown over tariffs, warning of ‘economic catastrophe’ if they don’t remain in place
item.description: The Trump administration says the court’s decision cast “a pall of legal uncertainty over the president’s efforts to protect our country.”

item.title: Deadly Floods Inundate Northern India
item.description: Heavy rains, flash-floods and cloudbursts have battered much of Northern India in recent weeks, killings hundreds of people and displacing more than a...

item.title: After Boat Strike, Rubio Says U.S. Will Help Other Nations ‘Blow Up’ Crime Groups
item.description: The Trump administration aims to carry out more violent strikes against drug cartels, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said as he met with Ecuador’s pre...

item.title: Europe Aims to Show It Is Ready to Secure Postwar Ukraine
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron of France hosted a meeting of leaders to review options for protecting any peace with Russia.

item.title: Time Is Running Out for Lebanon to Disarm Hezbollah, U.S. Officials Warn
item.description: The United States, Israel and the Gulf Arab states are pressuring Lebanon’s government to act decisively against the group.

item.title: Macron Said That 26 Countries Would Secure Ukraine
item.description: The pledges were made in Paris at a summit designed to show that Europe is ready to uphold any future peace deal for Ukraine.
